title: Textile, 1895–1905
medium: Technique: duplex roller printing on plain weave                                                    .
dimensions: A. warp:174cm (68 1/2 in.), weft (right selvedge only):63.5cm (25in.) B. warp:179cm (69 in.), weft: (left selvedge only) 72cm (28 1/4 in)
description: Flattened overblown floral forms and long and narrow leaves which move in a diagonal direction. Blue and white.
